description:
This dashboard is one of major topic for Kubernetes Book 
and best optimized for virtual machine environment provided with 
https://github.com/sysnet4admin/_Book_k8sInfra

Notice: It may be running on the other environment but cannot be guaranteed.

targets.expr:
(
  sum by (instance, nodename) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode!~"guest.*|idle|iowait"}[$duration])) 
  + 
  on(instance) group_left(nodename) (max(node_uname_info) by (instance, nodename))
) / $cpu_core - 1/$cpu_core

(
  node_memory_MemTotal_bytes  
  + 
  on(instance) group_left(nodename) max(node_uname_info) by (instance, nodename)
) 
-
( 
  node_memory_MemAvailable_bytes  
  + 
  on(instance) group_left(nodename) max(node_uname_info) by (instance, nodename)
)

(
 ((time() - node_boot_time_seconds + on(instance) group_left(nodename) 
node_uname_info{nodename="$node"})) 
and 
ON() kube_node_status_condition{status="true",condition="Ready",node="$node"} == 1 
)

title: K8s Infara Status Board Ver.2
